description:
When pure, nitrous oxide-injected adrenaline is in the air, and the moan of a custom-built supercar's engine blares out, you know Top Speed 2 has taken to the streets!

Features:
• Choose from 70+ of the fastest cars in the world!
• Test thousands of tuning and customization options!
• Play different racing game modes, like Story and Elite Mode!
• Explore 3 different maps: airport, highway, and docks!
• Discover dedicated limited-time racing events!
• Climb the Leaderboards, Win Races, and Become the Best! 
• Upgrade your car parts with no limits at thousands of levels! 
• Choose from over 100 different car decals!

Jump behind the wheel of the fastest cars; take part in another racing journey, and become the best driver!
name: Top Speed 2: Drag Rivals & Nitro Racing
